sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_mispers_action_item"> <x_snc_mispers_action_item action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <address/> <assigned_to display_value="Beth Anglin">46d44a23a9fe19810012d100cca80666</assigned_to> <case display_value="MISPERS0001002">6a009c311b745990db301f83b24bcb9a</case> <due_date>2023-07-20 17:55:00</due_date> <id>2751156</id> <notes>Cyccoms results often save time by better focussing address checks and other investigative activity
Initial request should normally be for call data, cell site data and consequential subscriber checks from a few hours before the person went missing - forward facing. But this will need justifying on a case by case basis. Also consider SIM pairing (Crosscheck) enquiries if the Misper may be switching SIM between networks. And a G1 Live trace for High Risk TTL cases.
For Risk to Life cases seek an urgent oral Supt authority. For other cases make a Cyccoms application yourself. Guidance on how to complete Cyccoms application is contained within the system itself, on the Cyccoms website in the form of PowerPoint guide and also a video tutorial. During office hours help can also be sought directly from the CAB on x3800
Once application is submitted please ring CAB on 3800 and/or send an email to FIB SPOC (External) spoc@leics.police.uk and Missing Persons Team missingpersonsteam@leics.police.uk inbox notifying them that the application pertains to a missing person - and they will expedite it. Failure to do so will result in it taking several weeks (rather than a couple of days) to complete. Please also record the application number on this task.</notes> <number>ACTION0001033</number> <report_reference>8</report_reference> <start_date>2022-07-20 17:55:00</start_date> <status>Suspended</status> <summary>false</summary> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-09-06 08:31:58</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c573cb8d1bf59190db301f83b24bcb0c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-09-06 10:59:47</sys_updated_on> <title>Cyccoms Enquiries on Mispers Phone</title> <type>Telephones</type> </x_snc_mispers_action_item> </record_update>
